content: अनुवर्तिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Following, obeying, conforming to, with <ab>acc.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>; राक्षसाश्चापि गृह्यंते नित्यं छंदानुवर्तिभिः <ls>Pt. 1. 69</ls>; नराधिपा नीचजनानुवर्तिनः <ls n="Pt.">1. 383</ls>. {@--2@} Guided by, following the advice of; obedient, faithful, compliant; अनुवर्तिनि कलत्रे <ls>Pt. 1. 101</ls>, <ls n="Pt. 1.">298.</ls> {@--3@} Like, resembling; suitable, worthy.
